text: I must admit, I haven't been the partner I promised to be in our marriage. Recently, I've realized my actions have hurt us bothâ€”missing important family events, not being present even when I'm home, and letting my work consume me to the point of neglecting our relationship. These are mistakes I deeply regret. I'm reaching out because I value your insight and care deeply about healing and improving. Can we talk about where to go from here?
I'm feeling lost and could use some spiritual advice. Can we talk?
